#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string s,p;
    cin >> s >> p;
    int m = p.length();
    s = "#" + p + "@" + s;
    int n = s.length();
    
    int pi[n], k=0;
    pi[1] = 0;

    for(int i=2;i<n;i++)
    {
        while(k>0 && s[i]!=s[k+1])
            k = pi[k];
        if(s[i]==s[k+1])
            k++;
        pi[i] = k;
    }

//    for(int i=m+2;i<n;i++)
//        cout << pi[i] << " ";
//    cout << endl;
    int cnt = 1,flag = 0;

    for(int i=n-1;i>=m+2;i--)
    {
        if(pi[i]==m)
        {
            if((i-m)>=m+2 && pi[i-m]==m)
                cnt++;
            else
            {
                printf("%d %d\n",i-m-m,cnt);
                cnt = 1;
                flag = 1;
            }
        }
    }
    if(flag==0)
        printf("-1\n");
return 0;
}
